data.name: The Nightmare Catcher
data.detailed_description:
Hello Adventurer welcome to The Nightmare Catcher project, a Sci-fi FPS exploration game, created by the solo developer ‚ö°XAEON GAMES‚ö°



The Story

In the year 2050 after the WW3 the Earth loses critical natural elements to maintain life, the world's government decides to create a program called ‚ÄúHumanz 4 Life‚Äù, dedicated to bring back hope to humanity, the scientists discover a potential way to farm the extinct elements, but they will need to get access to acouple of samples before testing, an small group of explorers start an interstellar travel to those near planets around the solar system that may contain samples of the missing elements.

During the trip the ‚ÄúAlpha‚Äù team, assigned to explore ‚ÄúKepler 186 F‚Äù, gets involved in an accident caused by a primordial black hole, that destroys its ship, they are forced to emergency land on a misterious planet using the scape pods.



Take the control of the astronaut John Perez to explore this mysterious "new" world and its threats, but the most important thing‚Ä¶ bring back hope to earth!

Greetings from Mexico! üõ∏ Thanks for your support.
data.about_the_game:
Hello Adventurer welcome to The Nightmare Catcher project, a Sci-fi FPS exploration game, created by the solo developer ‚ö°XAEON GAMES‚ö°



The Story

In the year 2050 after the WW3 the Earth loses critical natural elements to maintain life, the world's government decides to create a program called ‚ÄúHumanz 4 Life‚Äù, dedicated to bring back hope to humanity, the scientists discover a potential way to farm the extinct elements, but they will need to get access to acouple of samples before testing, an small group of explorers start an interstellar travel to those near planets around the solar system that may contain samples of the missing elements.

During the trip the ‚ÄúAlpha‚Äù team, assigned to explore ‚ÄúKepler 186 F‚Äù, gets involved in an accident caused by a primordial black hole, that destroys its ship, they are forced to emergency land on a misterious planet using the scape pods.



Take the control of the astronaut John Perez to explore this mysterious "new" world and its threats, but the most important thing‚Ä¶ bring back hope to earth!

Greetings from Mexico! üõ∏ Thanks for your support.
data.short_description: The Nightmare Catcher is a Sci-fi FPS exploration game, created by the solo developer XAEON GAMES, use an arsenal of weapons ranged, melee, grenades, magic abilities from the Aztec gods, unleash the power of magic and technology to craft items and discover new unique skills for your quest.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 13 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700k
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 13 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: May contain acts of violence or gore of a human being.
